de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc

Class CommonPCSCContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc.CommonPCSCContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPCSCContext, IPCSCContextFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PCSCContext

    public abstract class CommonPCSCContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPCSCContext
    A common implementation for IPCSCContext. The separation of common code to this superclass was due to the fact that the PC/SC API implementations of some manufacturer were quite poor and needed some special tweaks on each call on the java side... In these days we only use the standard concrete implementation PCSCContext.
